## Canonically citable texts

- existing, freely licensed editions of the major texts included the Complutensian Bible (Hebrew Bible, Greek Septuagint, Latin Vulgate, Aramaic Targum Onkelos): [on github](https://github.com/neelsmith/compnov)
- editions of contents specific to the Complutensian Bible (Latin glosses on Greek and Aramaic texts): [on github](https://github.com/neelsmith/complutensian-texts)


**Status**: 

- XML editions of Latin glosses in draft form through *Genesis* chapter 40
- Latin contents not fully machine validated
